name: Some Knights Left
description:
"Some Knights Left" for Ludum Dare JAM 33

You are the monster. It´s time to behave like one.

Trampel them down to gain power. Use your powerful attack to beat the boss knight in each wave.

--- Controls:
* arrow keys / wasd
* space
* kill the bard to start the wave

Made with phaser in 72 hours for ludum dare jam 33 #LDJAM

by @farwyler, @shakemeluzifer, @bmuig
